name: Taste for Adventure: Enter the Yumgeon
name_original: Taste for Adventure: Enter the Yumgeon
description:
Taste for Adventure: Enter the Yumgeon is an action-adventure game where you play as a cook looking for the ingredients to a legendary dish. To that end, you’ll fight monsters, compete with, and befriend other chefs. Become the best chef in the land, with the best dishes around!

You play as Basil Parsley - a young chef who’s working to become one of the greatest ever known. Right now, he works at Uncle Stew’s Restaurant, but he has bigger dreams than just making soups and stews. He doesn’t get much respect, so he goes exploring, hoping to find some unique ingredients that will impress his boss. While foraging, he notices the smell of delicious Italian food and stumbles right into a dangerous Yumgeon! Defeat the foodie creatures that lie inside to collect a legendary ingredient, and bring Basil one step closer to his dream of becoming a master chef!
